-------TODO ESTE SCRIPT YA HA SIDO ACTUALIZADO CON LOS DATOS DEL TRABAJO FINAL ----
CREATE DATABASE datascience2025;
GO

USE datascience2025;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA raw AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO


CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39345ghJ#KL95909234nl0zBe'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-04-23T07:07:35Z&st=2024-04-22T23:07:35Z&spr=https&sig=ZIuipDYfY6BMZ0Axks5J9DlVEscWeuTXoh6iUKD%2Ft%2BY%3D'
GO

USE datascience2025;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE UPExternalDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://sa2024uptrabajofinal.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPCSVFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2)
)
